# PSL Awards

The PSL awards is an awards evening held to honour South African football players, coaches and officials. It is conferred by the Premier Soccer League, with awards given to athletes from the Premiership and National First Division.
Premiership
Premiership Footballer of the Season
The Premiership Footballer of the Season was inaugurated in 2008.
